about_subtitle: Babban Ayyukanmu suna cikin Feraka, a Gabatarwa, Kedah, Johor, da Kuala Lumpur, kuma muna É—aukar ayyukan waje.
philosophy_text: Tsarin gine-gine ya fi kawai tsarin kawai - magana ce tsakanin mutane da muhalli. Muna nufin Æ™irar sarari da ke daidaita sauÆ™i, ladabi, da maras lokaci.
mission_text: Mun himmatu wajen kirkirar zane-zane da ke haÉ—uwa da ayyuka da kayan ado. Daga kayan don samar da, kowane daki-daki batutuwa-tabbatar da cewa kowane aikin ya gaya wa labarinsa na musamman.
team_text: Teamungiyar mu ta Æ™unshi masu fasaha da masu zane daga masu horo daban-daban, suna aiki tare don samar da Æ™wararru, Æ™irÆ™ira, da mafita ga kowane aiki.
